text:
I am building a package with an interactive REPL mode which involves few plotting functions.
Ik that by defining recipes I could avoid adding Plots as a dependency. But to stay consistent with the interface when users type `plot x y` I invoke the `plot(x, y)`  in the background. Is there a way I do that without adding Plots as a dependency? (maybe a lighter version that gets loaded/precompiled only when plots are called)
